description: Dashboard for Compal CH7465LG cable modems (marketed as "Connect Box" by several carriers)

panels.description: Assuming 256QAM modulation, [30dB is the minimum, 33dB or higher is recommended](https://pickmymodem.com/signal-levels-docsis-3-03-1-cable-modem/).
panels.title: Minimum Downstream RxMER

panels.description: Receive modulation error ratio (RxMER). [The higher the MER, the cleaner the received signal.](https://www.intraway.com/blog/monitoring-DOCSIS-3.1)
panels.title: Downstream RxMER

panels.description: Based on data from the past 5 minutes, what percentage of codewords was successfully corrected per second?

targets.expr: sum by(channel_id, source) (rate(connectbox_downstream_codewords_corrected_total{source=~"$source"}[5m])) / (sum by(channel_id, source) (rate(connectbox_downstream_codewords_unerrored_total{source=~"$source"}[5m])) + sum by(channel_id, source) (rate(connectbox_downstream_codewords_corrected_total{source=~"$source"}[5m])) + sum by(channel_id, source) (rate(connectbox_downstream_codewords_uncorrectable_total{source=~"$source"}[5m])))

panels.title: Corrected Codewords per Second

panels.description: Based on data from the past 5 minutes, what percentage of codewords could not be corrected per second?

targets.expr: sum by(channel_id, source) (rate(connectbox_downstream_codewords_uncorrectable_total{source=~"$source"}[5m])) / (sum by(channel_id, source) (rate(connectbox_downstream_codewords_unerrored_total{source=~"$source"}[5m])) + sum by(channel_id, source) (rate(connectbox_downstream_codewords_corrected_total{source=~"$source"}[5m])) + sum by(channel_id, source) (rate(connectbox_downstream_codewords_uncorrectable_total{source=~"$source"}[5m])))

panels.title: Uncorrectable Codewords per Second

title: Connect Box
